variables.name: selectLoadingState

variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(

)

variables.name: selectUsersState
variables.defaultValue: createFeatureSelector<UsersState>('users')

variables.name: startLoading
variables.defaultValue: createAction('[Loading] Start')

variables.name: stopLoading
variables.defaultValue: createAction('[Loading] Stop')

variables.name: usersReducer
variables.defaultValue:
createReducer(
  initialState,
  on(loadUsers, state => ({ ...state, error: null })),
  on(loadUsersSuccess, (state, { users }) => ({ ...state, users })),
  on(loadUsersFailure, (state, { error }) => ({ ...state, error }))
)
